snippet.title: Arcade Longplay [790] Begas Battle
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: georgc3

A very hard shump game. 
This game is based on the 1983 Japanese Anime film "Harmagedon: Genma taisen". 

This is even better than Konami's Badlands I longplayed a while back. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mvItwCcdIaE -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
